issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When a UFS host and the CLC are shutdown the following errors / messages are seen in the UFS log:

We should ensure that the cloudformation service shutsdown cleanly when the database is not available and ensure that any CF/SWF related worker threads terminate as soon as possible.
fields.summary: CloudFormation / SWF should better handle shutdown

comments.body: No known functional problem, but the logs fill up with alarming errors at ERROR level. To verify the fix, stop the services and check for lack of errors. Restart to confirm that cloud is functional.
Some "CLC likely down.  Will sleep for 5 seconds" errors may still be seen but the stack trace is addressed along with the InterruptedException error logging.
No longer seeing the ServiceTransitions stackstrace or the InterruptedException error logging
